description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. This is a tool used to check a Xbox 360 Controller for any Slowturn symptoms. The Tool recognises and display's Slowturn in both Axis' across both thumbsticks. The Slowturn checker was developed to aid those who wish to take their Game to the next level by allowing them to find and identify a perfect Controller.
description.short: This is a tool used to check a Xbox 360 Controller for any Slowturn symptoms. The Tool recognises and display's Slowturn in both Axis' across both thumbsticks. The Slowturn checker was developed to aid those who wish to take their Game to the next level by allowing them to find and identify a perfect Controller.
